title.narrative: The Joint Fund for the 2030-Agenda: Integrated Policy Support to advance the SDGs Multi-Partner Trust Fund

description.narrative: Here is a link to the homepage: www.jointsdgfund.org

The strategic focus of the Joint Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) Fund is to support national SDG policy and investments to accelerate and scale up SDG-progress at the national level, and to do so through joint policy and programme contributions of the UN Country Teams, under the leadership of the UN Resident Coordinators, and in line with UN Development System reforms.
The Joint SDG Fund constitutes a key institutional piece in the UN Secretary General’s reform agenda of the UN Development System. The Joint Fund enables the new and independent Resident Coordinators pool together and mobilize the full range of capacities and cross-agency collaboration of the UN Country Teams required to support the achievement of the SDGs in the local context.

organisation.narrative: Permanent Mission of Denmark to the United Nations, New York, USA

mailing-address.narrative: Chrysler East Building, 666 Third Avenue, 11th Floor
